title: Negotiate a Job Offer
description: A top candidate has received an offer but wants to negotiate for a higher salary.

tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter receives the candidate's request for a higher salary.

tasks.description: Consult with the hiring manager and compensation team to see if there is room to increase the offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter discusses the request internally and gets approval for a revised offer.

tasks.description: Present the revised, final offer to the candidate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter communicates the new offer to the candidate.
